entry.title: devnshankar/logato: Logato is a lightweight and fast logger for Node.js, designed for easy logging of messages, warnings, errors, and more. It supports color-coded logs, file logging, and even printing file contents directly to the console. Perfect for developers who need a simple and efficient logging solution.
entry.content: Logato is a lightweight and fast logger for Node.js, designed for easy logging of messages, warnings, errors, and more. It supports color-coded logs, file logging, and even printing file contents directly to the console. Perfect for developers who need a simple and efficient logging solution.
